pageContent: Introduction: The objective of this study is assess the outcomes of whole-gland ablation (high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU), cryotherapy and brachytherapy) and active surveillance (AS) in patients with low-risk prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
Image-guided robotic interventions for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23774960/
